tumor: Complex branching papillary structures lined by atypical epithelium.
Foci of squamous differentiation forming concentric keratin pearls.
Highly pleomorphic nuclei with coarse, vesicular chromatin.
Dense sheets of hyperchromatic purple cells with scant intervening stroma.
Irregular nests and fragments of tumor cells floating in white artifactual space.
Polygonal cells displaying a high nuclear-to-cytoplasmic ratio.
Prominent eosinophilic nucleoli within enlarged nuclei.
stroma: Irregular, labyrinthine arrangement of eosinophilic tissue.
Intersecting bundles of elongated, wavy pink fibers.
Delicate, spiky pink tissue septa surrounding large open spaces.
Patchy infiltrates of haphazardly oriented spindle nuclei.
Dense magenta collagen interspersed with small blue nuclei.
Thickened, densely packed hyalinized stromal bands.
Interstitial proliferation forming ragged, finger-like projections.
lymphocyte: Deep basophilic nuclei with minimal pink cytoplasm
Monotonous sheets of dense small blue cells
Ragged and scalloped edges on the tissue islands
Tightly packed cells forming dense purple aggregates
Highly dissociated single cells scattered on white background
necrosis: Amorphous fragments of wispy, pale pink cytoplasm
Scattered pyknotic and fragmented dark purple nuclei
Sheets of tissue showing diffuse eosinophilic homogenization
Loss of recognizable cellular and nuclear architecture
Ghost-like cellular outlines against a white background
Large pale cells containing multiple dark internal inclusions
Sharp boundary between dense viable tissue and acellular debris
blood_vessel: Dark purple nuclei aggregated at lumen boundaries.
Highly curved or C-shaped tissue segments.
Clear delineation between white voids and stained tissue walls.
The tissue forms thick, homogeneous structures.
Variable sizes of the enclosed circular spaces.
